references: Related: CF 261611. Amending: Ord 84905. Repealing: Ord 79924.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating the design, construction, alteration, operation and maintenance of elevators, escalators, dumbwaiters, moving walks and manlifts, amending Sections 1 through 6 inclusive of Ordinance 84905; adding a new section thereto designated Section 4A; and repealing Ordinance 79924.
